item.title: rpi-media-kiosk
item.description:
Overview

A plug-and-play solution to turn any Raspberry Pi into a full-screen media kiosk player. Automatically plays videos, PowerPoint presentations, PDFs and image slideshows from a USB stick or local storage — all rendered via Chromium.

Ideal for installations, exhibitions, digital signage or any stage use case requiring automatic media playback.

Features

  • Autoplay on boot
  • Supports: video, PDF, PowerPoint (converted), image slideshows
  • Load from USB stick or local storage
  • Chromium in kiosk mode (full-screen, no UI)
  • Simple configuration

Requirements

  • Raspberry Pi (any recent generation)
  • Raspberry Pi OS
  • Chromium (included by default on Raspberry Pi OS)

  • Language: HTML/Shell
